metadata.title: PM Shehbaz Sharif offers Jumma prayers at Masjid e Nabvi

content.article_body: MADINA, Mar 21 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Friday offered Jumma prayers here at the Masjid e Nabvi. After offering Jumma prayers, the prime minister left for Makkah by train along with his delegation to perform Umrah.
